hub_title: Winter Equestrian Festival at Wellington International – Rider’s Hub
hub_origin_line: Your go-to hub for the Winter Equestrian Festival in Wellington, FL.
hub_overview: Spanning January through March, the Winter Equestrian Festival transforms Wellington into the epicenter of the A-circuit. This hub brings riders, trainers, and owners together with insider know-how—from the jog strip to vendor row—so you can plan with confidence and focus on performance.
meta_description: Plan your Winter Equestrian Festival experience in Wellington, FL. Insider tips, lodging, dining, and everything A-circuit riders need for the season.
